pullRequest.title: [566434] Always call SemanticBrowserView.setInput in UI Thread
pullRequest.bodyText:
This avoids potential "Invalid thread access".
Bug: 566434
Change-Id: I842eabddab9d3cae38ef7a5f43abbf020c351541
Signed-off-by: Laurent Redor laurent.redor@obeo.fr

nodes.bodyText: I think is shouldn't be executed in async in order to have the same process as before but using the UI Thread

commit.message:
[566434] Always call SemanticBrowserView.setInput in UI Thread

This avoids potential "Invalid thread access".

Bug: 566434
Change-Id: I842eabddab9d3cae38ef7a5f43abbf020c351541
Signed-off-by: Laurent Redor <laurent.redor@obeo.fr>
